questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A. Do you think the cartoonist approved of China's behaviour in the oil-rig dispute? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. How far does the Chinese government in Source B agree with the Vietnamese government in Source C? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source D. Why did the United States make this statement? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source E. How useful is this source as evidence of the Vietnamese actions towards Chinese nationals? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source F. Are you surprised by this source? Explain your answer.
